name: The survival fork
description:
"The survival fork" is a survival game in which you have to provide energy to the generator of the island that protects it from destruction. You will play with Ed, the undisputed master of the fork. This game is creater for the Heart Jam 2018, the theme is "Scarcity" .

Controls :

- Arrow for move

- Z for attack

How Play :

- Keep your generator energized

- Collect energy ( Cut grass, Kill monsters, ... )
